source.title: The First Novgorod Chronicle, Synodal manuscript
source.annotator: Katie Sykes (2038 sentences), Marek Majer (616 sentences), Lena Borise (322 sentences), and Hanne Eckhoff (12 sentences)
source.electronic-text-version: Digitised from manuscript facsimile found in N.A. Tixomirov (ed.): Novgorodskaja xaratejnaja letopis’. Moscow: Nauka 1964. All supralinears taken down.
